TutoExplainContent: Welcome to the Video Viewer Activity. A browser and a viewer for Khan Academy, Canopé videos and more.
TutoFilterContent: Click here to filter the videos by category
TutoFavoriteContent: Click here to see the videos marked by you as favorite
TutoLibraryContent: Click here to choose between Khan Academy, Canopé videos or to add your own library
TutoExportvideoContent: Click here to save a video in the Journal. First click here then click on the video you want to save
TutoVideoContent: Click here to play the video
TutoSearchContent: Type here to search for a video by its name
